entry.title: Google Play Store (Game) - Romopolis

div.p: Claim it now for free on Google Play Store.
About the game (Romopolis*):

ul.li: Description: Construct an idyllic ancient Roman city with plenty of houses and keep your residents happy by providing all the services they need. You'll be rewarded with money, fame and honor. You can work your way to the top in the comprehensive campaign mode or you can create and play your own custom scenarios.

div.p: * Any information about the offer is automatically grabbed and may in rare cases not match the correct game.

entry.title: Google Play Store (Game) - OneShot

div.p: Claim it now for free on Google Play Store.
About the game (OneShot*):

ul.li: Ratings: Metacritic 80 % / Steam 98 % (10/10, 38713 recommendations) / IGDB User 81 % (5 sources)

Description: In this Puzzle/Adventure game you must guide Niko through a mysterious world, utilizing items, characters, and the environment to progress. The life of a lost child and the fate of a steadily decaying world hang in balance, and not everyone—or everything—is interested in preserving them either.

div.p: * Any information about the offer is automatically grabbed and may in rare cases not match the correct game.
